title: Erica Rossi
text:
Erica Rossi (<a href="Bolzano">Bolzano</a>, 20 November 1955) is an Italian former <a href="sprint%20%28running%29">sprinter</a> (400 m).
Biography.
In her career she won 20 times the <a href="Italian%20Athletics%20Championships">national championships</a>. She has 67 caps in <a href="Italy%20national%20athletics%20team">national team</a> (third of all-time after <a href="Marisa%20Masullo">Marisa Masullo</a>, 79 and <a href="Agnese%20Maffeis">Agnese Maffeis</a>, 73).
